SCTX:
Begin SadriFight

short nolore
short spellcheck
short ammogone
short nolore
short greetonce



if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	Return
endif


if ( greetonce == 0 )
	if ( GetDistance Player <= 512 )
		ForceGreeting
		set greetonce to 1
	endif
endif

if ( player->GetParalysis > 0 )
	set spellcheck to 1
else
	set spellcheck to 0
endif


if ( ammogone == 0 )
	if ( spellcheck == 1 )
		removeitem "ebony arrow_sadri" 50
		removeitem "daedric long bow" 1
		set ammogone to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "ebony arrow_sadri" < 1 )
		additem "ebony arrow_sadri" 50
	endif
endif

if ( ammogone == 1 )
	if ( spellcheck == 0 )
		additem "ebony arrow_sadri" 50
		additem "daedric long bow" 1
		set ammogone to 0
	endif
endif


if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	removeitem "ebony arrow_sadri" 1000
	removeitem "daedric long bow" 10
	additem "ebony arrow_sadri" 5
	additem "daedric long bow" 1
	"ordinator_MH_Sadri"->Disable
	Journal MS_Thief 80
endif

End
